mapper.insert: insert into ummenu (MENUID, MENUCODE, SYSCODE, MENUNAME, SHOWTYPE, REFURL, PARENTID, SMALLICON, BIGICON, APPTYPE, SHOWORDER, PARENTIDS, LEAF, TARGET, REFSYS, PROCESSID, MENUTYPE) values (#{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refsys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menutype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ummenu set MENUCODE = #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSCODE = #{syscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUNAME = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWTYPE = #{showtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFURL = #{refurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMALLICON = #{smallicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIGICON = #{bigicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPTYPE = #{apptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWORDER = #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARENTIDS = #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAF = #{leaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFSYS = #{refsys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSID = #{processid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUTYPE = #{menutype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MENUID = #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select MENUID, MENUCODE, SYSCODE, MENUNAME, SHOWTYPE, REFURL, PARENTID, SMALLICON, BIGICON, APPTYPE, SHOWORDER, PARENTIDS, LEAF, TARGET, REFSYS, PROCESSID, MENUTYPE from ummenu where MENUID = #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select MENUID, MENUCODE, SYSCODE, MENUNAME, SHOWTYPE, REFURL, PARENTID, SMALLICON, BIGICON, APPTYPE, SHOWORDER, PARENTIDS, LEAF, TARGET, REFSYS, PROCESSID, MENUTYPE from ummenu
